Articles.Content:
Hey Guys,
I have problems with ro again. When I launch a manned mission everything works fine but when i try to launch a sattellite it won't even ignite the engines and I have no control over the vessel but i have still connection with Mission control and i tried every probecore that exist in the game but nothing work.Everytime the same problem: I have connection to mission control but i no control on the vessel. Can someone help me pls
You might have a connection, but do you have power? No power = no control.
While adding batteries don't forget to put a few solar panels to keep them powered because it is frustrating to get up there only to become useless.

Have you checked your avionics? The avionics package you put on your rocket might not be powerful enough to handle it. Probe core avionics can typically only handle 1 ton, at most.

Edited December 1, 2016 by IncongruousGoat
